name: French Lentils
description: Ooh là là! Innovative microwave cooking means no more mushy lentils. And, they’ll be ready in just a matter of minutes. Serve as a side with salmon, roasted veggies, and quinoa; add to salads or sautéed greens; or serve on toast or pitas. C’est magnifique!

ingredients.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix or Rosemary Garlic Seasoning

preparation: In Square Steamer, combine lentils, veggies, dip mix, and oil. Cover and microwave on high 5–6 min. Stir before serving.
tips: French lentils are a variety of small, green lentils. To cook them, add 2 1⁄4 cups dried lentils to 6 cups boiling water; reduce heat and simmer for 20–25 min, or until tender. Drain any excess water and serve immediately.
